title: Meemure accident death toll increases to four
byline: The number of individuals died in yesterday’s Meemure accident has increased to four, police said.

title: Japan holds Upper House elections in key test for Prime Minister Ishiba
byline: Voting began on Sunday morning for an election for Japan’s House of Councillors, the upper chamber of parliament, a poll that could affect the fate of Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba, who leads a minority government.

title: 34 dead after tourist boat capsizes in Vietnam
byline: At least 34 people have died and several are still missing after a tourist boat capsized in Vietnam during bad weather.

title: Man hacked to death in Hekitta
byline: An individual residing in a two-storied house in Hekitta, Wattala has been hacked to death by four unidentified individuals who arrived in a three-wheeler, police said.

title: Heavy showers above 75 mm expected in some areas today
byline: Showers will occur at times in the Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces and in the Galle and Matara districts today (20), the Department of Meteorology said.
